name: Kingdom Crusher
description:
Version: ALPHA 1

Developer's Note: This game is in early alpha, meaning that not all features are complete, and many features are missing entirely. Stay tuned for more updates as we lead up to the full version!


Kingdom Crusher is a labor-of-love made over the course of one month in effort to breathe some fresh air back into the Breakout genre. Move your little knight around the map in a 2D free-axis version of the classic we all know and love. 

⚔️ Pick up your sword and crush some castles! ⚔️

  • [WASD] to move.
  • [Spacebar] or [LMB] to swing your sword.
  • *Mobile controls coming soon!

Each level has two kings, yours and the enemy. You will gain points for all castle pieces destroyed, even your own! But be careful, if your side's king is slain, you lose the level.

The game features several bonus point challenges for each level, as well as a Time Attack trophy. Hover over each one to see the requirements.
